label: Syriac 12, Arabic on Reinforcement Strips
summary: Reinforcement strips from an Arabic (?) parchment codex

note.value: The reinforcement strips on which this layer is written are from a parchment manuscript

program.label: Syriac Parchment Descriptions Project
program.description: Described as part of the Syriac Parchment Descriptions Project (2022-2025). The Syriac Parchment Descriptions Project was funded by a National Endowment for the Humanities grant. It aimed to provide full and detailed cataloguing of the Syriac manuscripts on parchment in the Sinai collection. Lead Cataloguer: Grigory Kessel; Research Associates: Natalia Smelova and Vevian Zaki.
